title: Eastin Hotel Ahmedabad Launches its GOURMET CARD: EASTIN GOURMET CIRCLETravelandtourworld.com
text:
Eastin Hotel Ahmedabad Launches its GOURMET CARD: EASTIN GOURMET CIRCLE
Stemming from Eastin’s desire to create a memorable and distinguished dining experience, Eastin Hotel Ahmedabad has launched its Gourmet Card – “Eastin Gourmet Circle” granting the members privilege of special offers and additional value adds at Eastin restaurants – The Silk Road and The Glass House.
The members of Eastin Gourmet Circle can enjoy the benefits and experience from a wide choice of cuisines from across the world for a period of one year. The membership entitles 50% discount on the bill when dining with another person at any of Eastin Hotel Ahmedabad restaurants, 33% discount when dining with the company of two, 25% discount when dining with the company of three, 20% discount when dining with a company of four, in addition to priority reservations, every time, at every restaurant. Furthermore, the guests can enjoy 15% discount on rooms and 30% discount on Spa.
The card augments the attractiveness of Eastin’s value proposition for its visitors. Members will be able to earn discounts on F&B – making it especially rewarding for them to dine at Eastin.
Gaurav Taneja, General Manager, Eastin Hotel Ahmedabad, said: “We have enjoyed the overwhelming support of our customers on the basis of a relationship built in the last one year. The card will help customers maximise the value they receive. It is our way of supporting our customers for their loyalty.
Source:- Eastin Hotel
